SEARCH
Package Models

Class Record

java.lang.Object
Models.Record
public class Record extends Object
The Record class represents a medical record containing details about a patient's diagnosis, prescribed medication, and treatment plan.

This class provides methods to retrieve and modify the diagnosis, medication, and treatment fields associated with a specific medical record.

Example usage:

     Record record = new Record("Flu", "Paracetamol", "Rest and hydration");
     String diagnosis = record.getDiagnosis();
     record.setDiagnosis(record, "Cold");
Since:
2024-11-21
Version:
1.0

      treatment - The treatment plan associated with the record.

    • setDiagnosis

      public String setDiagnosis(Record record, String diagnosis)
      Sets a new diagnosis for the provided Record.

      This method modifies the diagnosis field of the given record and returns the updated diagnosis.

      Parameters:
      record - The Record whose diagnosis is to be updated.
      diagnosis - The new diagnosis to set.
      Returns:
      The updated diagnosis as a String.

    • setMedication
